item.title: Report X-2024061703
item.description:
Report X-2024061703

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-03T15:13:24+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-27
  • City: INDEPENDENCE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: I have seen the same shipment come through and leak 3 times now. Zep Purple Degreaser, a Corrosive Hazmat, has leaked multiple times. All thanks to the caps coming loose. Can someone, please, reach out to the shipper and ask them to do something about this? Tape over the lids, a plastic bag, anything that helps prevent this from happening again.

item.title: Report X-2024061638
item.description:
Report X-2024061638

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-28T18:14:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-18
  • City: WALTON
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO A LEAKER AT THE HAZMAT CLERK STATION. UPON ARRIVAL RESPONDER SAW THERE WAS A FIVE GALLON CONTAINER, PUT ON PPE AND GRABBED DECISION TREE. RESPONDER NOTICED IT WAS A FLAMMABLE LIQUID AND PROCEEDED TO FOLLOW THE DESCION TREE AND IT LEAD ME TO THE FLAMMABLE LIQUID RESPONSE SHEET. RESPONDER CLEANED UP THE SPILL AND TOOK IT BACK TO DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
